credit_line: Gift of Joseph O. Eaton, Class of 1895
title: Two putti (after Titian's now destroyed 1530 Death of Saint Peter Martyr altarpiece in Santi Giovanni e Paolo, Venice)
description: two putti at top of Titian's St. Peter Martyr altarpiece (1530, destroyed in 18th c.)
inscriptions: l.l. in ink: 78; l.c. in pencil: per it San Pietro di Maria; l.r. in pencil: Tiziano; verso lower edge in pencil: [faint words and numbers]
